attributes.review: This app traumatized me it took about a week to load which was really frustrating cause I really wanted to make America great with our orange so after that weird things started happening like trump things started appearing in my room after 2 weeks of using it then trumps nudes showed up on my screen which was very disturbing DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!! TERRIBLE AND TRAUMATIZING HAVE TO GO TO THERAPY FOR A YEAR!!!! 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
attributes.title: Very bad 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

attributes.review: This app is supporting a horrible white supremacist but also it its not easy to navigate and does not respond well, this is one of the worst app designs that I have ever seen. Even as someone who is younger and have experience navigating apps for years this app just put me off by just even the apps logo, its inherently disgusting and if you support trump then you’re a white supremacist.
attributes.title: Blasphemy

attributes.review: I was excited 😊 at first but then I NOTICED THIS WAS NOT A TACO 🌮 BELL APP  .....My friend BIG BOOTY JUDY told me that TRUMP IS TAKING TIK TOK DOWN so I sat in a lawn chair 🪑 for the rest of the day..... BUT THEN a snake 🐍 came and bite my tush..... BUT THEN GUESS WHO IT WAS IT WAS NOT A SNAKE 🐍 BUT IT WAS  AN ORANGE GUY WITH A TUPE....IT WAS DONALD TRUMP.....SO IF YOU DONT WANNA GET BITTEN BY THE POISONOUS ☠️ DEADLY 💀 TRUMP SNAKE 🐍 THEN DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP............The next day I sued trump.... BUT HE SUED ME BACK....he won  😞.....then I GOT VERY MAD AND CHALLENGED HIM TO A BOXING 🥊 MATCH.....he never showed up 😢..... SO THAT MEANS I WIN.....I WANTED TO REALLY WIN SO I BECAME A CARROT 🥕......BUT THEN WHILE I WAS 😴 SLEEPING 💤..... I ACCIDENTALLY VOTED TRUMP FOR 2020 ( that was the worst mistake of my life)..... THEN IN THAT SAME DAY I GOT MARRIED.....TILL THIS DAY I KNOW THAT EVER SINCE I VOTED 🗳 FOR TRUMP 2020 Kanyae West, HAS BOT TALKED TO ME SINCE...
attributes.title: THIS IS BAD 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: I got this app to learn more about our orange leader but instead it’s only slowly turned my skin into a horrible burnt orange. I now have to get surgical treatment to fix my skin color. I would not recommend this for anyone ever. It’s absolutely horrible. I’m mocked walking the street as a mini trump. I even tried therapy and the therapists would laugh at me. I want my life back!!! 😭
attributes.title: Skin changes!!!

attributes.review: So like umm I don’t like this app because it just telling you how all the stuff is going on and I don’t like it at all and like it kept being annoying and I just don’t want it on the Apple Store or anything it is just a boring app and when I try to ignore it it just pops up every time and it makes me mad so like I don’t want the app on the apple store
attributes.title: Spam

attributes.review: if i could give this a 0/5 i would. very ugly app. i kept only seeing straight white cis gendered males? aka my own personal hell. it also gave me a virus on my phone ??? for some reason every time i try to send a text, a video of one of the property brothers starts playing. i'm not sure which one but it the video he's screaming at me, chasing me with a sledge hammer while saying "i'll take this wall down for more of an open concept. an open concept an open concept." until i trip and fall into a sewer where i see kelly ann conway and she looks at me and says "there's no way out." lemme know of this happened to anyone else.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: i downloaded the app, not knowing what to expect. it said once u get it harry styles will find u super attractive and want to date u. of course i take the chance. once i downloaded, i’m eating my lunch, and then my stomach starts to hurt. i run to the bathroom and my stomach is growing and in such pain. i sit on the toilet and faint. i wake up in a daze, i look around the bathroom and see that the floor is full of oranges. they’re chanting. they’re saying “china” and “fake news” all these crazy things. then it hits me. donald trump is the annoying orange. how did we miss this. harry styles shows up and slaps me in the face and says i hate oranges and now i’m here.
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I’m utterly confused and insulted by the content that this app has shared. I would also like to say that it was quite disgusting how the first image I was presented when opening it was a t*rd. I hope that this app improves or if not, deleted. Overall I believe that this app is deserving of less than one star but regrettably that is not an option. Do better Trump. 😢
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP. My young son was playing with my phone when he accidentally launched the app. Normally, I would be proud of him for seeking out information on our current political climate. However, when he opened the application, he saw THE GHOST OF CHRISTMAS PAST in the phone screen. The ghost proceeded to possess him and now I have to deal with exorcist bills. Thanks a lot.
attributes.title: Heart been broke so many times 👁👄👁 🦗🦟🦗🦟

attributes.review: this app took like a week to download and it would crash my phone text random people and the app isn’t worth anyone’s time so don’t get it 🥰
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
